comment.author: 31340371@N03
comment._content: I recognize this photo because of the steep hills. I lived a block away from this location in the early 60's. It was taken at the corner of Walmsley Boulevard and Castlewood Road.

comment.author: 30194653@N06
comment._content: Thanks  !  This is one of the photos included in the current exhibition of Rice photos at The Library of Virginia - now we can update the exhibition label with this new information.
